description.displayText:
You know that nanny you see at the park & wonder "How do I get THAT nanny?!". Well Vany, is that nanny. If we weren't moving to Europe we'd keep her!

So why is she so great?
1) effortlessly practices Reggio/RIE childcare.  She avoids using "no", instead explains the whys-hows of everyday life. Creates teaching moments out of.. reading, cooking, drawing, singing. 

2) Figures out how to make my life easy. Vany is always a step ahead of me.  She thought my boys to cover their faces when they cough, say please & thank you, potty trained my 2yo without me having to lift a finger (she even found a potty & underwear & sent me links), let's me know when she thinks my son is ready for a nap schedule change, the list goes on!

3) good EQ/discreet + hard-working/on-time
4) TONS of Experience (10yrs working w families of 4, 3, & 2 kids respectively!)  + TONS of energy. Vany is 33yo and has the most amazing positive energy. With her you don't have to sacrifice experience for energy. We love her!

She thought my boys to cover their faces when they cough, say please & thank you, potty trained my 2yo without me having to lift a finger (she even found a potty & underwear & sent me links), let's me know when she thinks my son is ready for a nap schedule change, the list goes on!

description.displayText: Vany is the absolute best. She is very caring, fun, playful, and respectful as well. I trust her and I feel very comfortable around her. Vany is punctual, reliable and friendly. She is a unicorn nanny! Vany is a pleasure to be around and she keeps everyone help. She gives the children all her attention and is a great example. Vany is the most fun person to be with.
